text: ehidi wadiduratath adahas dak wu manthriwaraya, “ eksath jathika pakshaya pumukha shri lanka nidahas pakshaya hawul aanduwa wasara gananak me rata palanaya karamin janathawata dunna pidawa, aarthika pidawa, asanwardhanaya, nohakiyawa, pilibimbau wena awasthawaka janathawage chanda ayithiya udura ganimin, ee sandaha palath sabha mathiwaranaya wasara 03 kata pamana kal damamin ee sandaha eekabaddha wipakshaya hatiyata api adhikaranayata yamin, parilimenthuwe hadak nagamin dan kramawedaya sakas karamin balapamwalata yatath wemin dan palath sabha mathiwaranayata awathirna wela thibenawa.
thama mawa, piya kawada ho miyayana bawe yatharthayata muhuna dimata thiyena hondama kramaya ohu samanga/aya samanga athi bandima nathi kara ganimada?
api kohomath ee wage deyak gana hihanne nane machan.
nithiyata pitin eya kohoma mata pilithuru lipiyak ewwada kiyala mama danne naha.
lek hawus miliyana 350kin goda eyi.
oyala kros weddi kamare babekge rupayak gahagena inna epa kiyala.
ada thamayi aya mulinma ahanne mama piyano wadanaya karanawa.
ma wenuwen boru kimata idiripath wu ekama kena ohu wu nisa ohuta boru kima mata apahasu wiya.
esenam, me upades pilipadima obe surakshithathawa sandaha...
kamakata nathi ekak nam katawath anumana karanna bariweyi.
shri lanka widuli bala mandalaye niyojya samanyadhikariwariyaka ha mage langama yeheliyaka thamayi apa ragena gihin me...
adhikarana amathi waraya da mema amathi waraya samaga sulutharayan pilibanda swadhina wisheshagnyayakuge paminimata owunge sahaya laba dena bawa ma samaga pawasuha.
udaharanayak lesin me wanawita lo pura prasiddha wi athi buddhimath dijital sahakaruwange sewaya samagin nimawi thibena spikar paddhathin penwa diya haka.
oya katha karana de wena ratakata adala wenna puluwan.
indiyawe saha pakisthanaye minisun awuwe welana lada kohombaa kola almari ha sahal asurana bhajana sandaha yoda ganimin krumi uwadura walakwa gani.

ke.ke.pi rangana amarasinha namathi ayeku wisin mohan balendra namathi siya nithignyaya margayen mema pethsama abhiyachanadhikaranaya hamuwe gonu kara athi athara ehi waga uththarakaruwan lesa nagenahira palath aandukara,nagenahira palath pradhana amathya,eki palath sabhawe aandu paksha mathi amathiwarun ehi wagauththarakaruwan lesa nam kara atha.

(lanka ee niws -2017.nowa.29, pa.wa.8.35) godanagili nathath kuliyata aran hari sabaragamuwa wishwa widyalaye nawa waidya pitayata sisun bandawa ganima labana wasare aarambha karana bawath honda upakulapathi warayeku hamuwi sitina bawath sabhanayaka, usas adhyapana ha mahamarga amathya lakshman kirialla mahatha ada pawasiya.
ohuta sawathatath sakethayatath athara hikmunu asun yedu riya hathak elawa thabannahu ya.

mema wadasatahana anuradhapura goldan mango risot hotalayedi pawathi athara idikirim, sancharaka, krushikarmika, saukhyaya, nishpadana, welendam, kiri nishpadana saha anekuth kshethrawala niyali sitina 60kata adhika sulu ha madhya parimana wyaparikayan pirisak eeta sahabhagi wuha.
- "aarakshitha thoraganima karanna.."

apage aarakshaka hamudawan wisin parajaya karanu labuwe lowa prabala thrastha sanwidhanayak wana athara ada shri lankawa nobenduna ratak bawata pathwa aththe wirodhara ranawiruwan itukala ema yuga mehewara nisa bawa kiya siti janadhipathithuma rate eekiyabhawaya surakima wenuwen aarakshaka hamudawa sidu kala ema kapawima samada gaurawayen sihipath karana bawa da sandahan kaleya.
meki katukabhawaya hamuwe lokaye wenath ratakata kese ho pana gos swakiya anagathaya sakshath ganima, wisheshayen tharuna parapura ilakka karana karanaya wi thibe.
lankawe me bahuthara gataluwalata hethuwi aththe madhya aayathana wala wagakim sahitha dhurayanhi sitina mola wirahitha pirisa saha palaka panthiyayi.
warimarga upa paddhathiye meheyum, nadaththu ha jala bhawithaya karyakshama kirima.
namuth kewala kramayedi sudussata pamanayi himi thana labenne.
an ayatath kiyawimata salaswanne nam manawi.
em.yu es kumara

kutumbha naya ganum pahatha watimak samaga ekwunu "mulya eekagrakaranaya”, enam aanduwe wiyadam kappaduwa nuduru anagathaye eksath janapada "suwawima” digata ma mandagami karanu athi athara, "mulya arbudayata pera apa dutuwata wada goliya illume eksath janapada dayakathwaya wada pahala yanu atha” yi jathyanthara mulya aramudale eksath janapada kandayame nayika giaan mariya milesi-fereti pawasuwa ya.

siddhiyata dina 3 kata pasu enam, 1912 ape්ral 18 wani da lankawe ”dinamina” puwathpatha eya mulwarata wartha kara thibune mahath wipaththiyak titanik nawa gili yayi athlanthik sagaraye gaman karana naw athuren ithama wishalawu noboda sadana lada titanik nam nawa palamuwani warata amarikawata pitathwa yamedi sagaraye pawemin thibuna maha midi diya kandakata hapi anathuruwa giliyana baw ema nawen sagaraye yana asala nawwalata yawana lada guwan widuli paniwudayakin danaganna ladi.

wesak pohoyata mewarath shri lanka samruddhi adhikariya anugrahayen dharmadanaya patha budusarana pitapath laksha thunak pradhana dharma deshanaya pawath wu niyangoda wijithasiri anu nayaka swamin wahanse wetha shri lanka samruddhi adhikariye adhyaksha janaral nithignya aar.pi. bandula thilakasiri mahatha pirikara puja kala awasthawa janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha pasugiya rajya wesak uthsawaye di pradhana dharma deshanawata sawan dun awasthawa budusarana puwathpatha pehewas samadan wu pirisa wetha nomilaye laba dena awasthawak aarthika sanwardhana amathya basil rajapaksha mathithumage margopadeshakathwaya yatathe shri lanka samruddhi adhikariye anugrahayen atawana waratath “budusarana” puwathpathe pitapath laksha 03k elambaena wesak pun poho dinaye di saha rajya wesak uthsawaye di nomilaye beda harimata awashya siyalu katayuthu sampadanaya kara atha.
